attributes.review: i think the whole “gen z shutting down the app” is dumb. but this app is genuinely awful. nothing will load. it freezes and crashes. i’m trying to support our president but apparently his staff can’t even run an app right. what are they going to do about our country???
attributes.title: awful app

attributes.review: This app is no good the information isn’t understandable, the app is hard to navigate. I did not enjoy using app horrible!
attributes.title: Trump app

attributes.review: I wanted to get this nap to really find the core of my rac!st tendencies and beliefs, but all I got was a bunch of articles telling me that I WAS the problem!! Good luck Charlie, except Charlie is this app. ✨

attributes.review: This app is so bad it makes me feel very mad don’t get it if I could I would give it a .1 star review

attributes.review: This app was very glitchy and kept kicking me out. I hoped to see what Trumps plans were for re-election but this app was very ineffective in doing so.
